DOC.brief_summary: The purpose combine retrospective prospective clinical study examine safety efficacy ROI-C® anterior cervical interbody fusion device VerteBRIDGE® plat treat single level degenerative disc disease C2 T1 short term , focus fusion rate .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective/Prospective Data Collection LDR ROIC Interbody Fusion Device With VerteBRIDGE Plating
DOC.criteria: Subject must degenerative disc disease ( DDD ) cervical spine accompany radicular symptom one level C2 T1 . The subject ROIC device one level . Autograft must use ROIC device . Subject minimum 6 ( six ) week nonoperative treatment prior surgery . Subject must least 21 year age time surgery No BMP use interbody cage Subject prisoner time surgery Subject pregnant time surgery Subject active infection sepsis time surgery
